revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=JCG |model=JHR-N805R |asin=B00AKNMLQI |fcc_date=07/09/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Yichen Technology |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HHOYC003 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206E |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=schematics |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=JCG-XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^JCG-[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:E0:4B |oui_eth=00:E0:4B }} '''150Mbps Intelligent (Vertical) Wireless Router'''
[http://jcgcom.com/products/35/1.aspx Product page] :[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/jcg-jhr-n805r-150mbps-intelligent-vertical-wireless-2572 On '''SpeedGuide''']
FCC photos show the device with a RT3050, FCC schematics show the device with an RT3052. :The FCC manual states antenna 1 is for RX only, so the device probably does indeed use RT3050.
Default settings are per the FCC label. :The default SSID pattern appears to be '''JCG-XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the BSSID (upper case letters).
Per the FCC documents (and supporting WiGLE data), the 00:E0:4B OUI is presumed to be used.
===Serial=== VCC, TX, GND, RX
===JTAG=== On SMD resistors: R21 (TDO), R23 (TMS), R22 (TDI), R24 (TCLK), R27 (TRST)
===See also=== [http://www.speedguide.net/broadband-list.php?brand=94 ''JCG'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] *[[JCG JHR-N805R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JHR-N815R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JHR-N825R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JHR-N835R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JHR-N916R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JHR-N926R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JI-524A]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JI-525A]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JI-S524A]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JI-S525A]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JIR-N605R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JIR-N615R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JIR-N625R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JIR-N635R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JIR-N655R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JIR-N664R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JIR-N815R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JIR-N915R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JWA-2000]] Wireless Access Point *[[JCG JWA-N2000]] Wireless Access Point *[[JCG JWA-N2003R]] Wireless Router *[[JCG JWA-N2100]] Wireless Access Point *[[JCG JWA-S2000]] Wireless Access Point *[[JCG JSL-300B]] DSL Router *[[JCG JWS-500TN]] DSL Wireless Router *[[JCG JWS-515TN]] DSL Wireless Router *[[JCG JWS-530TN]] DSL Wireless Router *[[JCG JER-588I]] Broadband Router *[[JCG JER-688I]] Broadband Router
